description: From Japanese "Tsukkomi". Meaning to retort or complain.

examples.translation: Foreigners complain that Chinese is hard to learn

examples.chinese: 互相吐槽人生不满,家庭不好的地方,互相安慰
examples.translation: Complaining to each other about life dissatisfaction and family issues, comforting each other

examples.chinese: 每天都在断电!民众吐槽不断
examples.translation: Power outage every day! People complain endlessly
Why is no one retorting to me!!!

examples.chinese: 顶不住,还是想吐槽一句
examples.translation: Can't hold it in, still want to make a retort
